detailsData.title: Board Certification
detailsData.content: Aaron A. Herbert is one of the less than 2% of attorneys in Texas who are board certified in personal injury trial law, demonstrating a significant level of experience and expertise in this field.

detailsData.title: No Fees Unless You Recover
detailsData.content: The firm operates on a contingency fee basis, meaning clients do not pay attorney fees unless they recover compensation for their injuries, reducing the financial risk of pursuing a claim.

detailsData.title: 24/7 Consultation
detailsData.content: Offering round-the-clock consultation ensures that potential clients can reach out for legal assistance at any time, providing convenience and accessibility.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: With a track record of success, including hundreds of millions of dollars recovered for clients, the firm's experience and aggressive litigation strategies lead to real results.
